General.Name: Kuya Silver Corporation
General.Description: Kuya Silver Corporation, a mineral exploration and development company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and advancement of precious metal assets in Canada and Peru. The company explores for lead, zinc, copper, and gold minerals. It primarily holds interest in the Bethania silver project with four concessions totaling 4,845 hectares located in Central Peru; and the Silver Kings project covering approximately 18,000 hectares located in Northern Ontario, Canada. Kuya Silver Corporation was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 150 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 1J9
